# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (Mono Auto Generated)
mono_crash.*

# User-specific files (Windows)
*.userprefs

# User-specific files (Linux)
.directory

# User-specific files (Mac)
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# User-specific files (Visual Studio Code)
.vscode/*

# User-specific files (Rider)
.idea/

# Team Sharing
.classpath
.project
.settings/
.loadpath

# Temporary folders
*.tmp
.temp
tmp/
temp/
.cache
.ctags

# Folder config file
Folder.settings

# Folders for precompiled header files
*.pch

# Folders for static libraries
*.lib

# Folders for object files
*.obj
*.o

# Folders for binary files
*.exe
*.dll
*.out
*.app
*.ipa
*.dmg
*.rdb
*.a
*.so
*.lib
*.exp
*.pdb
*.mod
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Folders for IDEs and editors
.vs/
.idea/
.eclipse/
.project/
.metadata/

# Ignore directories
.vs/
MauiRoutePlanner/.vs/
MauiRoutePlanner/bin/
MauiRoutePlanner/obj/
